components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE
summary: THE VEHICLE DIED DUE TO THE FUEL LINE COMING OFF, WHICH WAS DUE TO THE  FAULTY INSTALLATION OF THE GAS TANK.  THE VEHICLE WOULD STALL ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS.  THE DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER WAS SENT A RECALL OF THE IGNITION SWITCH.  SCC
